name: Hardlight (darzzler, MJA2709, impuuuu, Theudemeres, clacha, wells4lee, Amber Smith)
name_original: Hardlight (darzzler, MJA2709, impuuuu, Theudemeres, clacha, wells4lee, Amber Smith)
description:
In a fantasy world on the brink of technological advancement, wild elemental monsters are wreaking havoc. A team of volunteer heroes must team up with the spirits of nature themselves in order to save the day. Strategize by choosing your fighters and the spirits that possess them, and lead your team into battle!

Controls:

  • Escape to set difficulty
  • Left click to select vessels and cast abilities
  • Right click to move vessels
  • Middle mouse button/arrow keys to pan map
  • Left shift to skip dialogue
